settings.heading: Alpha-Lipoic Acid
settings.text: Alpha-Lipoic Acid is vitamin-like nutrient helps neutralize free radicals by restoring the activity of other antioxidants, such as vitamins C and E, and glutathione.

settings.heading: Artemisia
settings.text: A concentrated extract of the leaves of Sweet Wormwood (Artemisia annua), an herb from the Far East, used for centuries in China. Sweet Wormwood is primarily known for its active compound called artemisinin. Artemisinin and its derivatives are used to treat fever, inflammation, and malaria, and other parasites.

settings.heading: Arthri Pawz
settings.text: Arthri Pawz supplement contains natural compounds like glucosamine and Boswellia extract, which promote joint mobility and flexibility, reduce pain and inflammation, and support cartilage production.

settings.heading: Activated Charcoal
settings.text: Activated charcoal, also known as activated carbon, is a form of carbon that has been processed to have a large surface area and numerous pores. Activated charcoal is used in veterinary medicine to mitigate gastrointestinal (GI) tract toxins in cats and dogs.

settings.heading: Fidospore
settings.text: Fidospore by Microlabs is digestive probiotic designed to support digestive health and reduce leaky gut in dogs. This probiotic can restore the balance of healthy gut bacteria in your pet’s digestive system.

settings.heading: Free and Easy Wanderer
settings.text: Free and Easy Wanderer is the classic formula to help support the Liver in Traditional Chinese Medicine. It helps to course the Liver, reducing irascibility, smoothing the flow of Qi and Blood in the body.

settings.heading: Heartburn Tx
settings.text: Heartburn Tx Powder contains nutrients to reduce inflammation in the intestines, and the raw materials to help healthy new enterocytes (cells of the intestine) grow and restore normal gut function.

settings.heading: Turmeric with Bioperine®
settings.text: Turmeric have potent antioxidant properties to help protect your pet's cells and tissues from damage, and may also help relieve joint aches and pains. Bioperine keeps the GI tract healthy and Coconut oil increases energy levels, improves digestion, skin, and coat, and reduces allergic reactions

settings.heading: Hista Paws
settings.text: Hista Paws with Quercetin and Nettles is allergy supplement is specially formulated for cats and dogs, and contains a powerful blend of natural ingredients that work together to soothe and relieve allergy symptoms.

settings.heading: Holistic Total Body Support
settings.text: Holistic Total Body Support for Cats & Dogs is a premium pet multivitamins designed to support your pet's overall health and wellness.

settings.heading: Liposomal Glutathione
settings.text: Liposomal Glutathione is the biologically active form of Glutathione, the master antioxidant of the body. When the liver is not functioning properly, adding Glutathione helps the liver clear away the backlog of detoxification the liver has been struggling to keep up with.

settings.heading: Milk Thistle
settings.text: Milk Thistle is known to help support the liver from previous damage and can protect against toxins. Studies have shown Milk Thistle reduces liver inflammation and liver damage in patients with liver diseases.

settings.heading: MegaMucosa
settings.text: MegaMucosa is an innovative gut health supplement designed to support a healthy mucosal barrier. This unique formula contains dairy-free immunoglobulins that have been clinically shown to boost the immune system

settings.heading: Coriolus
settings.text: Coriolus by MycoHerb is a supplement made from Coriolus or Turkey Tail. It serves as a potent tonic for the immune system, respiratory system, and supports liver function and vitality

settings.heading: Curcuma NF-KB - Gaia Turmeric Supreme
settings.text:
GAIA's Supreme Turmeric Supplement consists of a proprietary blend of
a powerful whole plant profile of Turmeric’s valuable properties. Curcumin, known for its powerful
anti-inflammatory properties, is also rich in antioxidants that support
the body's natural detoxification process

settings.heading: Digestive Enzymes Klaire Labs
settings.text: Digestive enzymes supplement by Klaire Labs aid in digesting a wide variety of foods, including protein, fats, carbs, sugar, and fiber†. They can boost nutrient absorption, and relieve occasional indigestion, gas, bloating, and fullness.
